00010     inline bool SysIsLittleEndian()
00011     {
00012 #ifndef ORBIG_ENDIAN_MACHINE
00013       return true;
00014 #else
00015       return false; 
00016 #endif
00017     }
00018     inline bool SysIsNotLittleEndian() { return !SysIsLittleEndian(); }
00019     inline UShort_t& Swap(UShort_t& x) 
00020       { return (x = (((x & 0xff00) >> 8) | 
00021                      ((x & 0x00ff) << 8))); }
00022     inline UInt_t& Swap(UInt_t& x) 
00023       {
00024         return (x = ((x & 0xff000000) >> 24) | 
00025                     ((x & 0x00ff0000) >>  8) | 
00026                     ((x & 0x0000ff00) <<  8) | 
00027                     ((x & 0x000000ff) << 24));
00028       }
00029     inline ULong64_t& Swap(ULong64_t& x) {
00030       return (x = ((x & 0xff00000000000000LL) >> 56) |
00031                   ((x & 0x00ff000000000000LL) >> 40) |
00032                   ((x & 0x0000ff0000000000LL) >> 24) |
00033                   ((x & 0x000000ff00000000LL) >>  8) |
00034                   ((x & 0x00000000ff000000LL) <<  8) |
00035                   ((x & 0x0000000000ff0000LL) << 24) |
00036                   ((x & 0x000000000000ff00LL) << 40) |
00037                   ((x & 0x00000000000000ffLL) << 56));
00038     }
